author: gstein
msg: Add a comment about problems in read_from_file.

author: gstein
msg: Use sizeof() rather than hard-coded values in case the buffer declaration
* client/main.c (read_from_file): use sizeof rather than len; imagine if len
got shorter each time, then you'd ask for less each time.
[ of course, that doesn't happen with apr_full_read, but still... ]
* libsvn_wc/entries.c, libsvn_wc/questions.c: use sizeof rather than BUFSIZ
